DOC.brief_summary: This safety efficacy study different administration regimens nivolumab plus Ipilimumab subject previously untreated , unresectable metastatic melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Multiple Administration Regimens Nivolumab Plus Ipilimumab Subjects With Melanoma
